settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Glycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Propanediol, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Betaine, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Limonene, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Chloride, Adenosine, Linalool, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Ceramide NP, Centella Asiatica Extract, Citral, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Prunella Vulgaris Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Origanum Vulgare Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate

Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW

STEP 1

Before using, shake well to mix oil and water phases.


STEP 2

Close your eyes, then spritz evenly all over face and wait for product to be absorbed.


WHEN

Before applying Step 4 of the Expert RIMAN Ritual, Calming Balance Gel, and whenever you need a boost of hydration throughout the day, to keep your #RIMANGlow strong!

Click Here for Full Set of Steps

settings.text:
1. Camellia seed oils, Seaberry Water, and various other hydrating ingredients infuse dry skin with nutrients to moisturize and revitalize whenever it is needed.
  2. The bi-phasic nature of this spritz allows for a layer of water and oil to delivery both hydrating (water-based) and moisturizing (oil-based) ingredients to the skin for a greater luminosity.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
